mapper.update: update userinfo set user_photo = #{user_photo}, user_url = #{user_url}, user_intro = #{user_intro}, user_tag = #{user_tag}, user_nickname = #{user_nickname} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select distinct p.project_no, project_title, project_content, project_status, project_startdate, project_enddate from project p left join project_member m on p.project_no = m.project_no where p.pm_no=#{user_no} or m.member_no=#{user_no};
